author: Staff Reporter
text:
Hundreds of residents of Thomaiyarpuram blocked National Highway-7 here on Sunday demanding concrete efforts to slow down passing vehicles near their area in order to prevent road accidents.

They resorted to road blockade after a car knocked down a two wheeler killing a person and injuring two others on Sunday evening.

Chinnavar (40) was killed on the spot and two others - Raja (40) and Dharmar (40) - all of Iyankulam - were injured when a car knocked down their two-wheeler near Thomaiyarpuram.
title: Residents block road
